record.id: field.name="id" and file.name="rootcause" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: id
record.file.name: rootcause

brief.brief: The unique ID of the associated Problem record.
To perform a search based on this field, type the Problem Management number. For best results, specify the full number in the form of PMxx, where xx is the number.
If you have a partial number, type the partial number to access a list of possible records, but your list may not include all possible records.
For example, if you enter PM2, you would get a list of all Problem record numbers starting with 2: PM2, PM20, PM21, and so forth.
Before searching, clear the Smart Search check box.
Do not use wildcards, such as *, in your search.
